name: Proverbs 3:5-6 Trust
description:
"Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and lean not on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge Him, and He will direct your paths." Prov. 3:5-6. What an awesome promise from God! This canvas is a reminder to trust Him no matter what the circumstances may be. He will always guide you, always be with you, always give you courage and faith.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: As For Me and My House
description:
Joshua 24:15 "As for me and my house, we will serve the Lord." What a statement to display! Created with a distinctly strong design, this print makes a perfect gift for the man in your life.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: You Make Me Happy
description:
"You are my sunshine, my only sunshine. You make me happy when skies are gray." My mother sang this song to me when I was a child, and I sang it to my own children when it was my turn. My son says it will be the song played for our "mother-son" dance at his wedding someday. {cry} I dedicate this print to mothers and babies everywhere.
 
© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

14" x 14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Be Still Ps.18:10
description:
Be still....and know that I am God. Proverbs 31:30.

Stillness....how our souls need it. In this busy world, it is good to remember that it is in the quietness that we find God and hear His voice...and feel His comfort. This black and cream floral print is feminine and modern rustic.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Proverbs 31:25 BB
description:
Proverbs 31:25 - "She is clothed with strength and signity, and she laughs with no fear of the future."

The Proverbs 31 woman radiates beauty from the inside, because she knows that her worth is far beyond rubies. She is diligent, creative and most of all virtuous. I want to be her!!

This girl has brown hair and brown eyes. There is an option for blue eyes if you want to customize.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Prov. 31:30
description:
Charm is deceitful and beauty is vain, but a woman who fears the Lord is to be praised, Proverbs 31:30.

The Proverbs 31 woman radiates beauty from the inside, because she knows that her worth is far beyond rubies. She is diligent, creative and most of all virtuous. I want to be her!!

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Lamentations 3:22-23
description:
God's mercies are new every morning; great is His faithfulness...what an incredible promise for those who believe. I've experienced His great faithfulness over and over in my life, and I love being reminded of it in such a beautiful way. Created on a subtle black and cream background, this canvas print is perfect for almost any decor. Both artsy and elegant, it illuminates Lamentations 3:22-23 in a meaningful way.

Printed on high-quality archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

14"x14" square, gallery wrapped canvas, 1.25" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Nest
description:
Oh, I love bird nests! There is something about the way they are beautifully woven together to shelter those little eggs! I'm inspired to feather my own "nest" for the little chicks in my family whenever I see one. The soft blue-gray background here makes this print a perfect addition for almost anyone's nest, too.

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Print will have copyright watermark removed.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

11" x 14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Hope, Dream, Believe
description:
Jeremiah 29:11 says, "For I know the plans I have for you, plans to prosper you and not to harm you; plans to give you a future and a hope." How often I've lost my hopes and dreams, only to be reminded that God has a good future ahead for me. I cling to the knowledge that He is leading me (and you!) toward blessing and joy.

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Print will have  copyright watermark removed.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

11" x 14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Dream a Little Dream
description:
Go on, dream a little! This canvas print is currently one of my very favorite designs because it just reminds me that it's really OK to let myself dream! What are YOU dreaming about? Be inspired to make your dreams happen with this colorful print to decorate your space.

Printed on high-quality archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

14"x14" square, gallery wrapped canvas, 1.25" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Delight Yourself in the Lord
description:
Psalm 37:4 "Delight yourself in the Lord and he will give you the desires of your heart." It's amazing how, when I find delight in him, my desires change! He is the source of joy, strength and delight...everything else pales in comparison. 

Pink hydrangeas are one of the great delights that God has placed on this earth! Here, they are old-fashioned beauty on a playful blue background. 

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Print will have copyright watermark removed.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

11w" x 14h" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Strength and Dignity - and Laughter
description:
The Proverbs 31 woman is clothed with strength and dignity, and she laughs with no fear of the future. I want to tell every single woman, "You don't have to be afraid! The Lord is with you!" He holds your future in the palm of His hand. I love the young Proverbs 31 woman in this piece, and I see my daughters and their friends in her! Beautiful - inside and out.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: His Eye is on the Sparrow
description:
One of my favorite memories from my childhood is listening to Ethel Waters singing "His Eye is on the Sparrow" on my parents' record player. I can still hear her incredible voice in my mind.

"Why should I feel discouraged? 
	Why should the shaddows come? 
	Why should my heart be lonely 
	and long for heaven and home, 
	When Jesus is my portion? 
	My constant friend is he: 
	His eye is on the sparrow, 
	and I know he watches me. 

Refrain: 
	I sing because I'm happy, 
	I sing because I'm free, 
	for his eye is on the sparrow, 
	and I know he watches me." 

Printed on high-quality archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

14"x14" square, gallery wrapped canvas, 1.25" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Galatians 5:1 Freedom
description:
"It was for freedom that Christ set us free." Wow, what a powerful truth in this verse. When we put our faith in Jesus Christ, he sets us free from the power of sin. And if we are free, then we should walk in that freedom!

Classic scripture design for any home or church.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark will be removed from finished print.

14" x 14" square, gallery wrapped canvas print, 1.5" deep. Signed by artist. Ready to hang.

name: Small Things with Great Love -Black/Cream
description:
"We can do no great things, only small things with great love," by Mother Teresa.

Created on a subtle black and cream background, this canvas print is perfect for almost any decor. Both artsy and elegant, it makes a great thank you gift from the heart, or simply a reminder that small things do matter.

Printed on high-quality archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

14"x14" square, gallery wrapped canvas, 1.25" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: God is Never Far
description:
"God did this so that men would seek him and perhaps reach out for him and find him, though he is not far from each one of us..." Acts 17:27. Oh, how I love this moving, impassioned speech by Paul! We feel our way to Him, though He is never far. He is as close as whispered prayer, and He touches our souls with sunlight and grace.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original.  Copyright watermark will be removed from finished print. 

14" x 14" square, gallery wrapped canvas print, 1.5" deep. Signed by artist. Ready to hang.

name: Bless Our Home - Three Chicks
description:
"Bless our home...." It's a prayer that says so much in three little words. It means, "bless all who enter, envelop us with your love and grace, let us glorify you, and keep any evil from befalling us." We ask God's blessing on our children, our marriages, and the work of our hands....because without His blessing, nothing would be of value. 

I'm a big softie when it comes to decor with a rustic feel. This print is perfectly at home in a kitchen or guest area and brings a smile to my face every time I see it.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

14"x14" square, gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Thanks for Lending Your Ear
description:
Good friends know that sometimes lending an ear is the best gift you can give. Inspired by Flash, my long-eared friend, this print makes a great gift for a friend, or simply one to keep for yourself. (FYI, Flash's little friend's name is Tweetums.)

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark will be removed from finished print.

14" x 14" square, gallery wrapped canvas print, 1.5" deep. Signed by artist. Ready to hang.

name: Love Never Fails
description:
Love never fails. It reaches to the deepest, darkest corner to bring light and healing. Love is the most powerful force in the world, and I want my life to be filled with so much love that it overflows into everything I do.

This piece has a rustic feel that complements a modern country decor. 

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: We Can Do No Great Things
description:
"We can do no great things, only small things with great love." ~Mother Teresa. This is one of my favorite quotes! I sometimes get caught up in wishing I was doing some great thing for the world, and feeling frustrated with my own small efforts. This art piece is a reminder that every small thing, when it is infused with love, is important. I choose to love my family each time I pick up socks, wash dishes or pack a lunch. I can look around in my community and find ways to make something good happen. Love makes all the difference.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

14"x14" square, gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Prov. 31 Her Children Arise and Call Her Blessed
description:
Her children arise and call her blessed! My children are all grown up now, but back when I was struggling with diapers and nap times I wish I could have seen a picture of them as they are today - incredible people. I loved my little ones so very much, even when the going was tough. These days they bless me many times over with their love and encouragement, and I am truly seeing the fulfillment of this promise.

Hang in there, sweet mama! You WILL experience the blessing and fruit of your work.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Grateful Heart
description:
"In everything give thanks," I Thess. 5:18. I've found that cultivating a grateful heart, especially in the midst of difficult times, brings me new perspective and joy. We have all been blessed with so very much....how can we not give thanks to God for all He has done? This soft blue design is a perfect reminder of this!

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.


11" x 14" canvas print, gallery wrapped, signed, and ready to hang. 1.5" deep.

name: Psalm 31:14,15 I Trust in You
description:
"I trust in You, Lord, my times are in your hands." There is nothing more we can say, especially when we don't understand our circumstances. We can trust that our heavenly Father knows the beginning and the end, and has a purpose for everything.

This photo was taken from our front yard in Texas, and then artistically altered.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark will be removed from finished print.

14" x 14" square, gallery wrapped canvas print, 1.5" deep. Signed by artist. Ready to hang.

name: Her Children Arise and Call Her Blessed -2
description:
This sweet mama is near and dear to my heart. Proverbs 31 says that "her children arise and call her blessed; her husband also, and he praises her." Sometimes, when moms are in the thick of raising little ones, it's hard to imagine either of those things happening! But they will, just wait and see.

I'd love to give this print to every mom - to remind her that her work will not go unnoticed, and that she will enjoy the blessings of her children forever. 

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, signed and ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Friendship Comes in All Shapes and Sizes
description:
Flash and his little friend Tweetums discover that friendship is all about the heart. I designed this darling piece as a friendship card, but fell in love with it and decided to make it into a canvas print. 

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

10"wx15h", gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Infinite Grace
description:
2 Corinthians 12:9 "My grace is sufficient for you; my power is made perfect in weakness."

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from finished print.

11"x14" square, gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Psalm 90:17
description:
"And let the beauty of the Lord our God be upon us." This is my life scripture - it has been my favorite since I was a teenager. I love to think about the beauty of the Lord, and I love to see His beauty revealed in nature. This gorgeous photo of a Texas wildflower called Antelope Horn was taken in our pasture by my husband, Tom. The perfection in the blossoms is absolutely stunning!

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark will be removed from finished print.

14" x 14" square, gallery wrapped canvas print, 1.5" deep. Signed by artist. Ready to hang.

name: She is Clothed with Strength and Dignity
description:
Proverbs 31 describes the virtuous woman being clothed with strength and dignity - isn't that beautiful?? Regardless of her circumstance or income, she can hold her head high because her character is honorable and full of grace.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark is removed from print.

11"x14" gallery wrapped canvas print, 1.5" deep, ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Life is Better Shared
description:
Life is better shared - featuring Flash, my intrepid donkey. Flash showed up on our doorstep and never left, and since then he has become a mascot for character. There is never a dull moment when he's around.

Friendship makes life better...because pretty much everything is better when it's shared. Whimsical and fun canvas print to brighten your walls.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark will be removed from finished print.

14" x 14" square, gallery wrapped canvas print, 1.5" deep. Signed by artist. Ready to hang.

name: Ephesians 3:20,21 Exceedingly Abundantly
description:
"He is able to do exceedingly abundantly above all that we ask or think." Wow! I wonder how often we limit God by asking and thinking small? He is able to do so much more that we can imagine....and it's by the same power that works within us!

Classic design that is just right for home or church setting. I've got one of these in my kitchen!

© Rachel Anne Ridge

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Copyright watermark will be removed from finished print.

14" x 14" square, gallery wrapped canvas print, 1.5" deep. Signed by artist. Ready to hang.

name: Psalm 86:11 Teach Me Your Ways
description:
Teach me your ways, Oh Lord and I will walk in your truth. Give me an undivided heart that I may praise your name. This photograph of Texas wildflowers along a dusty road was taken by my husband, and then given an old-fashioned patina to fit this awesome verse.

Printed on archival canvas from mixed media original. Print will have copyright watermark removed.

© Rachel Anne Ridge

11w" x 14h" gallery wrapped canvas, 1.5" deep, ready to hang. May be framed.

name: Company Girl - The Book
description:
"Company Girl" is the sweetest term for the kind of friend who keeps you company along life's journey. My daughters have taught me more about friendship through their quaint little phrase than I ever learned on my own. Do you have a special girlfriend, sister, mother, or daughter in your life? This beautiful gift book is a perfect gift that reminds us that friendship starts with an outstretched hand and an open heart. 

© Rachel Anne Ridge 2010

8.25" x 8.25" 84 pages, full color paperback

Each is signed by Rachel Anne.

$4.00 shipping if purchased by itself. If purchased along with other products, there is no additional shipping charge.

name: Custom Text
description:
Want to customize a print by adding or changing the text? Most of the text on my prints has been created digitally so that customization can be possible. Simply make a note in the "notes" field on the order page, along with the complete text you would like, and select this "Custom Text Product."

There is a small $10.00 fee for a simple change. If your request requires extensive photoshopping or re-design, we can convo via email to work out an appropriate charge.
